unnormalised: The Leela Palace Bengaluru has been selected as the venue for the upcoming Global Tech Summit on 12/12/2024. Delegates from around the world are expected to attend the event at 23, Old Airport Road, Bangalore, 560008. The venue was chosen for its state-of-the-art facilities and proximity to the city's IT hub.
normalised: The Leela Palace Bengaluru has been selected as the venue for the upcoming Global Tech Summit on twelfth december two thousand and twenty four. Delegates from around the world are expected to attend the event at twenty three, Old Airport Road, Bangalore, five six zero zero zero eight. The venue was chosen for its state-of-the-art facilities and proximity to the city's I-T hub.

unnormalised: Official invitations are being sent out this week, specifying the venue address as The Leela Palace, HAL 2nd Stage, Kodihalli, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560008. The invitation also mentions alternative contact number for venue assistance as +91-80-25211234. The summit aims to bring together industry leaders, policymakers, and innovators to discuss the future of technology.

The invitation also mentions alternative contact number for venue assistance as plus ninety one eighty two five two one one two three four. unnormalised: Organisers have confirmed that parking arrangements will be available at the venue (limited availability) and shuttle services will operate from the nearest metro station, Indiranagar Metro Station, CMH Road, Bengaluru - 560038. Security measures are being implemented to ensure the safety and security of all attendees at the noted address.
